name: Horké Léto 2
storyline: This time around, the hero of the previous game Honza Majer is being teleported to the Wild West. The reason and actually how was that possible is unknown. He appears in a village where the native Americans live. The local shaman gives him a dangerous task - find the Purple Salamander, the sacred stone which was stolen by a one-eyed thug Dingo.
summary: It is a point-and-click adventure with hand-paintend graphics and focused on (not always) logical puzzles, funny minigames and crazy humor. It takes place in the Wild West. It´s the second game in the series.
